name: 李懿軒
objective:
本課程由機械工程的角度出發，結合基礎電化學原理，介紹燃料電池的基本原理及種類，由最新市場發展現況導入，介紹燃料電池的發展歷史及最新現況，同時說明提升燃料電池效率及壽命的關鍵影響因素，結合實作方式深入了解燃料電池特性。
This course is based on the principle of mechanical engineering and electrochemical theory to introduce the basic principles and types of fuel cells. From the latest development in the global market, the course will introduce the fuel cell history and the latest products of fuel cells. The improvement of fuel cell efficiency and lifetime will be explained through   fundamental theory and experiments.
